speech.0: Allow me to extend sincere congratulations on your assumption of the Presidency of the General Assembly at its sixty-first session and to express our full confidence in your ability to guide the session successfully. Let me also express our appreciation to your predecessor, Mr. Jan Eliasson, for his leadership during the sixtieth session. My delegations appreciation also goes to the Secretary-General, Mr. Kofi Annan, for his selfless to you, Madam President, our those charged with
